item.title: Every day Git commands for developers
item.description: Here are some day to day useful git commands Show all remotes (origin and upstream) git remote -v git remote show origin #shows branches, tags etc. git remote show upstream #shows branches, tags etc. Add upstream remote (vs origin remote) git remote add upstream git@github.com:username/git-repo.git Remove a file from a Git repository without deleting it from the local filesystem For single file: git rm --cached myremotefiletodelete.log git commit -m "remove file from repo" git push For single directory:
